txt.en: 'Don't tell Master Adso, but I don't really know how to use these weapons. I found them on a dead man near the Greenway.'
'I don't know what I'm going to do if any brigands show up again...I'll probably just run.'
'You're not one of those brigands are you? Master Adso's paying me good coin, but I'm no fighter.'
'I'm really getting tired of pacing back and forth like this. Maybe I'll go back to hawking goods in Bree.'
'I've had it with those two jackanapes that Adso hired to put up his inn.'
